dialogue.htmlContent:
You decide that the best course of action would be to just submit and let the imps use your body.

The imps like this idea, and push you down ready to have sex with you...
You decide to take advantage of the imps, and move to have sex with them...
You decide to take advantage of the imps, and move to have sex with them. You decide to take it slowly...
You decide to take advantage of the imps, and move to have sex with them. You decide to teach them a lesson they won't soon forget!
You feel sorry for the imps, and offer yourself to them. They quickly move to take advantage of you, and before you know it, the imps are swarming over you, ready to have sex...
Imps move to have sex with you.
Imps move to have sex with you. You eagerly respond.
Imps move to have sex with you. You resist.
You spit out the TF potion.
You gulp down the TF potion.
You are transformed! Imps now want sex with you.
Having used the imps, you continue on your way.
Having been used by the imps, you spend some time getting your breath back before continuing on your way.
